tool_description: This API specializes in extracting and returning comprehensive metadata from LinkedIn profiles or company URLs. Upon input of a LinkedIn URL, the API efficiently gathers crucial details such as professional background, skills, endorsements, company history, and network size. For company URLs, it retrieves business-specific information like industry sector, key personnel, company size, and location. This tool is perfect for professionals seeking in-depth insights for networking, recruitment, m...
name: LinkedIn Profiles & Company Data
title: LinkedIn Profiles & Company Data

api_list.name: LinkedIn Profile URL/Company Page URL Data Extractor
api_list.description: This API retrieves detailed metadata from LinkedIn profiles and company URLs, providing essential information such as professional background, skills, company history, and business specifics. It's an invaluable tool for networking, recruitment, and market research, offering quick and comprehensive insights with each query.
